name: A Shepherd's Duty
description:
Available on Google Play Store as well! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.godotengine.ashepherdsduty

How to play:

  •     WASD to move
  •     F to turn werewolf
        (only when you have at least one sheep following you)
  •     P to pause/unpause the level
